content: **skill level ** intermediate **size ** one size **finished measurements ** total height 21 5 hood height 16 hood width 21 rib neck height 6 **gauge ** 20 sts and 28 row = 4 in moss st pattern take time to check gauge **materials ** 50% wool 230 yds / 100g per skein 2 skeins shown in deep sea needles us size 7 4 5mm 24 circular needle and us size 6 4mm 16 circular needle notions stitch marker tapestry needle **pattern notes ** worked top down seamed together at top at the end
